short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon lets users easily switch between accounts on LiveJournal-based websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LJ Juggler is a simple tool designed to allow you to rapidly switch which LiveJournal (or LiveJournal derivative) user you are logged in as.
